name: fhir-toolkit
description: TypeScript toolkit for building and validating FHIR resources
author: Roberto Araneda <robaraneda@gmail.com>

scripts.generate:all: pnpm --filter @fhir-toolkit/codegen generate:r4 && pnpm --filter @fhir-toolkit/codegen generate:r4b && pnpm --filter @fhir-toolkit/codegen generate:r5
scripts.release: turbo run build && pnpm publish -r --access public
